attributes.action: Help those unemployed by actually making use of the jobcentres. Training, Social and Employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I myself was unemployed, and I found the jobcentre useless, they did not care if I had found a job or not. Neither were they any help, they looked at my sheet and I went. I found a job off my own back with none of there help, they didn't even ask if I wanted help. I want them to have better training and people skills as they left me feeling alone and helpless.

rejection.details: Please use a full name and please make a call for specific action or change.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
